content: a fast fun and chunky christmas stocking you can make in an evening add a pompon or two for extra fun crochet hook needed to make the hanging loop or you could do a single stitch i-cord if you haven t any hooks this has not been tested except by myself so please let me know if something isn t clear or you think you found a mistake my yardage used was very different from the first one to the second but still well under the full skein plenty left to make poms
